mapper.insert: MERGE INTO MOVIE_SIMILAR ms USING (SELECT #{similarMovieId} AS similar_movie_id, #{movieId} AS movie_id FROM DUAL) src ON (ms.similar_movie_id = src.similar_movie_id AND ms.movie_id = src.movie_id) WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (similar_movie_id, movie_id) VALUES (#{similarMovieId}, #{movieId})
